effect: Take 1 Wound and roll a CON check. On a failed roll, the character will die in D20 rounds (or 1 Time Track reset) unless administered an antidote.
Take 1 Wound and roll a CON (+5) check. On a failed roll, the character will die in D20 rounds (or 1 Time Track reset) unless administered an antidote.
Pass a CON check or receive 1 Wound.
Pass a CON check or be Knocked Down (no damage).
